entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Possible bug related to `UnscopedRef` introduced in 7.1.200 #67626
  • Completions in VB method declaration interfere with smart break line #67624
  • `IAwaitOperation.Type` shouldn't be void for VB when await is bound as statement #67616
  • EditorBrowsable(EditorBrowsableState.Never) does not work on parameterized property #67615
    Backlog

Closed

  • Lightbulb performance improvements #66968
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix main-vs-deps merge overwriting merge from 17.6-vs-deps #67629
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove excessive allocations of SourceLocations with mergedecls #67627
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Always include syntactic classifications in semantic response #67625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update publishdata for 17.6 after snap #67628
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid having to reread files from secondary storage just to get their version information #67603
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Async lightbulb performance improvement #66970
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use OneOrMany in the node->BoundNode map #67606
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge 17.7-vs-deps back into 17.7 #67618
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge main-vs-deps back into main #67617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to main #67620
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Update publishdata for -vs-deps deletion #67623
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67619
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to release/dev17.7 #67609
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Port #67597 to main #67614
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Switch semantic model to use `OneOrMany` instead of ImmutableArray for hot paths that often return a single value. #67587
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move off of the final usage of an uncached AsyncLazy #65780
    Area-IDE
  • Handle assignments in patterns #67517
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Work to unify threading concepts between Workspace and ProjectSystemProjectFactory (part1) #67522
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reduce the number of Location objects created during binding #67601
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • State machine and lambda EnC analysis fixes and simplification #67608
    Interactive-EnC, untriaged
  • [Lightbulb Perf] AnalyzerDriver performance improvements #67591
    Area-Analyzers, Tenet-Performance, untriaged
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [17.6] Check count before reusing cached items in `BatchNode` #66992
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Adjust comment for CompilerAnalyzerThrows in resx file #67589
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Round-trip extensions via metadata #67530
    Area-Compilers, C# 12.0
